description: Try our easy to follow Fennel & Citrus Pork Belly recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork belly,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Fennel & Citrus Pork Belly Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the garlic, fennel seeds, and lemon and orange zest in a bowl to make a paste. Rub all over the pork, pressing it into the cuts in the skin. Season well.
Place the meat in a roasting pan. Roast in a preheated oven, at 220°C, for 20 minutes. Reduce the oven temperature to 175°C, and cook for another 1 hour, until the meat is crisp and cooked through.
Cut the meat into small bite-size pieces and serve.
